items.title: This AI Warps Live Video in Real Time
items.summary: A startup called Decart has developed an AI model that can transform live footage, producing mind-bending results and has the potential to disrupt streaming services.

items.title: Behind The Godfather Of AI’s Terrifying Comments Lies A Valid Point About The Future Of Work
items.summary: AI may disrupt white-collar work, but manufacturing jobs remain essential. The future of work may be more hands-on than anticipated.

items.title: This MSI RTX 5070 Hits an All-Time Low, Amazon Is Clearing the Shelves of GPUs
items.summary: MSI RTX 5070 GPU hits an all-time low price as Amazon clears its shelves of GPUs.

items.title: pygeai 0.3.0
items.summary: pygeai 0.3.0 is a Software Development Kit designed to interact with Globant Enterprise AI, offering new applications for integrating AI technology into various software solutions.

items.title: Vance didn't tell Jasmine Crockett to 'go back to the zoo'
items.summary: During a congressional hearing in mid-2025, U.S. Vice President JD Vance did not tell Rep. Jasmine Crockett to 'go back to the zoo', refuting earlier reports. The incident highlights the importance of maintaining civility and respectful discourse in political settings.

items.title: San Jose Mayor Matt Mahan wants city workers to use AI after it wrote his speeches
items.summary: San Jose Mayor Matt Mahan is advocating for city workers to use AI tools after experiencing its benefits in speechwriting, emphasizing the potential to streamline operations and improve services for residents.

items.title: geomltools 0.1.6
items.summary: geomltools 0.1.6 is a Python library designed for spatial machine learning and geospatial analysis.

items.title: opentelemetry-instrumentation-together 0.42.0
items.summary: The release of OpenTelemetry Together 0.42.0 includes AI instrumentation for improved monitoring and tracing capabilities in applications.

items.title: opentelemetry-instrumentation-mistralai 0.42.0
items.summary: OpenTelemetry Mistral AI instrumentation has been released in version 0.42.0, offering AI-related instrumentation capabilities for OpenTelemetry. AI instrumentation enables better monitoring and tracing of AI applications for improved performance and reliability.

items.title: opentelemetry-instrumentation-google-generativeai 0.42.0
items.summary: Version 0.42.0 of OpenTelemetry Google Generative AI instrumentation has been released, providing enhanced tracking and monitoring capabilities for AI applications.

items.title: Trump administration order requires interior secretary to sign off on all wind and solar projects
items.summary: Trump administration order requires interior secretary to sign off on all wind and solar projects, potentially hampering projects that need to move quickly.

items.title: Trump administration order requires interior secretary to sign off on all wind and solar projects
items.summary: Trump administration order requires interior secretary to personally approve all solar and wind energy projects on federal lands and waters, raising concerns about potential delays and increased bureaucracy.

items.title: Trump administration order requires interior secretary to sign off on all wind and solar projects
items.summary: Trump administration order requires interior secretary to sign off on all wind and solar projects, potentially slowing down renewable energy development on federal lands.

items.title: Amazon Eliminates Hundreds of Cloud Computing Jobs
items.summary: Amazon has cut hundreds of jobs in its AWS cloud division, affecting its cloud computing sector.

items.title: TikTok Germany moderators raise alarm over layoff plans
items.summary: TikTok Germany moderators raise alarm over layoff plans as they fear being replaced with artificial intelligence, potentially risking the safety of platform users.

items.title: mlrun 1.9.2rc3
items.summary: mlrun 1.9.2rc3 introduces new features for tracking and configuring machine learning runs.

items.title: Roblox’s New Age Verification Feature Uses AI to Scan Teens’ Video Selfies
items.summary: Roblox is using AI to scan video selfies of teens to verify their ages for a new 'Trusted Connections' feature allowing unfiltered chatting with known users.

items.title: DV DEADLINE: ROSEN, A LEADING LAW FIRM, Encourages DoubleVerify Holdings, Inc. Investors with Losses in Excess of $100K to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action – DV
items.summary: Rosen Law Firm is reminding DoubleVerify Holdings, Inc. investors with losses over $100K to seek counsel before an important deadline in a securities class action lawsuit.

items.title: Implementing on-demand deployment with customized Amazon Nova models on Amazon Bedrock
items.summary: Implementing on-demand deployment with customized Amazon Nova models on Amazon Bedrock for AI applications, including step-by-step implementation guides using AWS Management Console and APIs.

items.title: E-commerce player Rokt buys Canal
items.summary: E-commerce player Rokt acquires Canal to expand its ecommerce product offering and help clients unlock new revenue streams.

items.title: NVIDIA (NVDA) Gets Green Light for China Sales, Analysts See EPS Upside Ahead
items.summary: NVIDIA Corporation receives approval to sell in China, with analysts predicting potential earnings per share growth. Wall Street is showing increased interest in AI stocks like NVIDIA.

items.title: Amazon's AWS cloud computing unit cuts at least hundreds of jobs
items.summary: Amazon's AWS cloud computing unit has cut at least hundreds of jobs, joining other tech firms in job cuts. The exact number of jobs cut has not been disclosed.

items.title: Carolyn Elefant Talks Owning Your Talent, AI and the Future of Solo Practice on Real Lawyers Podcast
items.summary: Carolyn Elefant discusses owning your talent, AI, and the future of solo practice in a podcast interview, highlighting the importance of generative AI for solo and small-firm lawyers.

items.title: Amazon workers are piecing together cloud division layoffs in internal messages
items.summary: Amazon employees are trying to piece together layoffs in the cloud-computing unit, Amazon Web Services, through internal messages on Slack. The cuts come after CEO Andy Jassy discussed the importance of AI in the company.

items.title: Perplexity AI said to hit $18B valuation after funding
items.summary: Perplexity AI reached an $18 billion valuation after a new round of funding, exceeding $14 billion. The firm has been able to raise a significant amount of funding over the past 18 months.

items.title: Who is Tren de Aragua Leader 'Niño Guerrero' Donald Trump is Sanctioning?
items.summary: The United States Treasury's Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) imposed sanctions on Thursday against Hector Rusthenford Guerrero Flores, also known as 'Niño Guerrero,' along with five other key leaders.

items.title: TechM to invest in sales, marketing in next 2 years across key markets: Mahindra
items.summary: Tech Mahindra plans to invest in sales and marketing in key markets over the next two years, with a focus on their edge in AI technology. During the Annual General Meeting, they highlighted how AI is reshaping businesses and society.

items.title: Malaysia bets on tech sector to secure its economic future
items.summary: Malaysia is betting on its tech sector to secure its economic future and become a regional leader in the digital economy, facing challenges such as environment, resources, and geopolitics.

items.title: opencode-ai 0.1.0a21
items.summary: Opencode-ai 0.1.0a21 released, the official Python library for the opencode API.

items.title: TSM Reports Record Profits, Lifts Forecast — But Stays Cautious
items.summary: TSM Reports Record Profits, Lifts Forecast but remains cautious amidst gaining attention on Wall Street.

items.title: Astronomer CEO Andy Byron raved about Kristin Cabot months before being caught on Coldplay kiss cam
items.summary: Astronomer CEO praises Kristin Cabot's leadership and expertise in talent management and employee engagement, highlighting her importance as they continue to grow rapidly.

items.title: Finding value from AI agents from day one
items.summary: AI agents are being used to provide value to businesses from day one by tasks such as reading customer's minds, identifying cybersecurity loopholes before hackers strike, and restructuring global supply chains to avoid disruptions.

items.title: Sources: Perplexity jumped to a $18B valuation two months after it raised at $14B; its annualized revenues jumped from $35M in August 2024 to $150M this month (Financial Times)
items.summary: Perplexity, an AI-powered search engine, saw a significant increase in valuation to $18B and annualized revenues from $35M in August 2024 to $150M this month, attracting new investors.

items.title: Robinhood CEO Says Majority of Company's New Code Written by AI
items.summary: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev stated that majority of the company's new code is written by AI, with close to 100% of engineers using AI code editors. Around 50% of new code at the trading platform is AI-generated.

items.title: Perplexity’s Comet is the AI browser Google wants
items.summary: Perplexity has launched Comet, an AI-powered browser that aims to rival Google Chrome. Currently, Comet is only available to Perplexity Max users.

items.summary: ROSEN, RECOGNIZED INVESTOR COUNSEL, encourages Reddit, Inc. investors to secure counsel before an important deadline in a securities class action lawsuit.

items.title: pygpt-net 2.5.48
items.summary: pygpt-net 2.5.48 is a Desktop AI Assistant powered by various OpenAI models including GPT-4, DALL-E 3, and others. It supports chatbot, agents, completion, image generation, vision analysis, and more.

items.title: Dell 16 Plus 2-in-1 (DB06250)
items.summary: Dell's newly released 16 Plus 2-in-1 laptop aims to combine strong performance with a convertible design, but struggles under the weight of its ambitions.

items.title: Dell 16 Plus 2-in-1 (DB06250)
items.summary: Dell's 16 Plus 2-in-1 (DB06250) is a large laptop that struggles with its convertible features, aiming to offer strong performance and versatility in a big form factor.

items.title: Imagen Now Works on Video With AI-Powered Frame-By-Frame Color Correction
items.summary: Imagen is expanding its AI-powered editing platform to video with a new feature for frame-by-frame color correction, catering to professionals in the video editing industry.

items.title: AMD’s new 96-core Threadripper CPU will set you back $11,699 - The Verge
items.summary: AMD's new 96-core Threadripper CPU is priced at $11,699, targeting high-performance users who require extensive computing power.

items.title: realvirtual.io AI Builder by realvirtual
items.summary: realvirtual.io AI Builder allows users to train, test, and deploy AI in Unity for industrial vision and automation, including generating synthetic data, running ONNX models, and connecting to real PLCs.

items.summary: OpenAI introduces ChatGPT agent that can complete tasks using its own computer

items.title: US Ally Calls China Greatest Threat
items.summary: Japan raises concerns over China's military presence, labeling China as the greatest strategic challenge in the Asia-Pacific region. The voice behind this statement is AI-generated, which may lead to inconsistencies.

items.title: Owner Wonders What Dog Does Home Alone—Instant Tears When She Watches Cam
items.summary: Owner feels guilty leaving dog home alone, watches AI-generated voice on camera, feels relief.

items.title: OpenAI launches personal assistant capable of controlling files and web browsers
items.summary: OpenAI launches personal assistant capable of controlling files and web browsers, with the ability to find restaurant reservations and go shopping for users. OpenAI acknowledges there are 'more risks' associated with this technology.

items.title: The Best Media & Journalist Databases You Can Use
items.summary: The Best Media & Journalist Databases You Can Use provides information on finding the right journalist for effective media outreach.
